mapper.insert: insert into product (pnum, pname, pcategory, publisher, pimage, pqty, price, summary, point) values(product_seq.nextval, #{pname}, #{pcategory}, #{publisher}, #{pimage}, #{pqty}, #{price}, #{summary}, #{point})
mapper.select: select * from product order by pnum asc;
